abilities.name: AMBUSH
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their ships.

abilities.name: PILLAGE
abilities.description: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, if he has 3 or more trade goods, you may take 1 of their trade goods or commodities.

flagship.name: Fourth Moon
abilities: Other players' ships in this system cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE

base.name: Promise of Protection
base.effect: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Mentak player cannot use their Pillage faction ability against you.
base.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Mentak player's units, return this card to the Mentak player.

base.name: Suffi An
base.ability: After the PILLAGE faction ability is used against another player: You may exhaust this card; if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card

base.name: S'Ula Mentarion
base.unlockCondition: Have 4 cruisers on the game board
base.ability: After you win a space combat: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory notes from their hand

base.name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
base.ability: At the start of a space combat that you are participating in: You may purge this card; if you do, for each other player's ship that is destroyed during this combat, place 1 ship of that type from your reinforcements in the active system.
